verses.verse: And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%>, and <S%H4390>replenish<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And the fear of <S%H4172>you<s%> and the dread of <S%H2844>you<s%> shall be upon every <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and upon every <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%>, upon all that <S%H7430>moveth<s%> upon the <S%H127>earth<s%>, and upon all the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> are they <S%H5414>delivered<s%>.
Every moving <S%H7431>thing<s%> that <S%H2416>liveth<s%> shall be <S%H402>meat<s%> for you; even as the <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H6212>herb<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> you all things.
<S%H389>But<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with the <S%H5315>life<s%> thereof, which is the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof, shall ye not <S%H398>eat<s%>.

And <S%H389>surely<s%> your <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H5315>lives<s%> will I <S%H1875>require<s%>; at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of every <S%H2416>beast<s%> will I require <S%H1875>it<s%>, and at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>; at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> will I <S%H1875>require<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>.

Whoso <S%H8210>sheddeth<s%> <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, by <S%H120>man<s%> shall his <S%H1818>blood<s%> be <S%H8210>shed<s%>: for in the <S%H6754>image<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he <S%H120>man<s%>.
And you, be ye <S%H6509>fruitful<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%>; bring forth <S%H8317>abundantly<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> therein.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H5146>Noah<s%>, and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with him, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
And I, behold, I <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you, and with your <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>you<s%>;

And with every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that is with you, of the <S%H5775>fowl<s%>, of the <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and of every <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> with you; from all that go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark<s%>, to every <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you; neither shall all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> any more by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of a <S%H3999>flood<s%>; neither shall there any more be a <S%H3999>flood<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, This is the <S%H226>token<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> between me and you and every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that is with you, for <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>:
I do <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H7198>bow<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and it shall be for a <S%H226>token<s%> of a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> between me and the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
And it shall come to pass, when I <S%H6049>bring<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> over the <S%H776>earth<s%>, that the <S%H7198>bow<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>:

And I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, which is between me and you and every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall no <S%H5750>more<s%> become a <S%H3999>flood<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.

And the <S%H7198>bow<s%> shall be in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>; and I will look upon <S%H7200>it<s%>, that I may <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H996>and<s%> every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that is upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5146>Noah<s%>, This is the <S%H226>token<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, which I have <S%H6965>established<s%> between me and all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that is upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%>, that went <S%H3318>forth<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark<s%>, were <S%H8035>Shem<s%>, and <S%H2526>Ham<s%>, and <S%H3315>Japheth<s%>: and <S%H2526>Ham<s%> <S%H1931><s%> is the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>. Canaan: Heb. Chenaan
These are the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%>: and of them was the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H5310>overspread<s%>.
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to be an <S%H376>husbandman<s%> <S%H127><s%>, and he <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>:
And he <S%H8354>drank<s%> of the <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and was <S%H7937>drunken<s%>; and he was <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%>.

And <S%H2526>Ham<s%>, the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>.

And <S%H8035>Shem<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H8071>garment<s%>, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it upon <S%H8147>both<s%> their <S%H7926>shoulders<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H322>backward<s%>, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%>; and their <S%H6440>faces<s%> were <S%H322>backward<s%>, and they <S%H7200>saw<s%> not their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>.
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H3364>awoke<s%> from his <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and <S%H3045>knew<s%> what his <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> unto him.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>; a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall he be unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem<s%>; and <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%>. his servant: or, servant to them

<S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H6601>enlarge<s%> <S%H3315>Japheth<s%>, and he shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem<s%>; and <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> shall be his <S%H5650>servant<s%>. enlarge: or, persuade
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141><s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.
And all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141><s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: and he <S%H4191>died<s%>.
